# Purpose
We want to add Fujitsu compiler to Spack.

# List of Changes
Changes of lib/spack/env/cc
…Add Fujitsu compiler commands that
　fcc as C compiler, FCC as C++ compiler, and frt as fortran compiler.

Add files to lib/spack/env
…Make a directory named compiler's name, then "fj" is an abbreviation of Fujitsu compiler.
　And make symbolic links to cc.

Changes of etc/spack/defaults/packages.yaml
…Add "fj" to list of compilers.

Add a file "lib/spack/spack/compilers/fj.py"
…This file defines Fujitsu compiler commands and available options.

# Confirmed operation
$ spack compiler add
 →spack detected Fujitsu compiler as spack's compiler.
$ spack compilers
 →Fujitsu compiler was displayed.
$ spack install zlib %fj
 →I could install zlib by Fujitsu compiler on spack.
title: Add Fujitsu compiler to Spack.
